name: Wong Ling
description:
I am an outdoor person , straight and simple, I like my smile as i believe happiness is one thing you can give yourself just by smiling!.
I am a goal getter , a never giving up kinda guy. I share a great humor . I am spiritual and not religious , I love Nature and i love Pets, Ocean and Sea Side.
i am easy going person
i love to cook and i am hard working man i hate to be lazy because a greatest mistake a man can do is doing nothing i can dance very well and i love reading
